sec.title: Introduction
sec.p: The purpose of Clause 7 is to place privacy protection in the context of public policy requirements, i.e., the overall legal and regulatory requirements which apply to an individual learner as a “buyer” generically in a learning transaction in an ITLET context. The focus here is the fact that when the buyer is an individual learner then the (legal) rights, which an individual has, must be supported and modelled.

Clause 6.3 in iec:std:iso-iec:15944-5:2008-05:::ISO/IEC 15944-5:2008 sets out the overall approach and key rules. They are summarized and expanded with respect to the privacy protection perspective and in an ITLET context.
